overview.en: Social Lending Network (SLN) is a decentralized social finance platform based on block chain technology. Its mission is to establish a next generation crypto-currency/token financial loan ecosystem.
overview.zh: Social Lending Network(SLN)是一个基于区块链技术的去中心化全球社交金融平台。Social Lending基金会将致力于在数字资产领域，构建一个全新的金融借贷生态系统。
